name: get_chapter
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bible_memory_verse_flashcard.
Tool description: This KJV Bible API v2 allows users to retrieve verses/chapters in 1 of 8 formats.
API description: Fetches and returns a specific chapter from the Bible given the book name and various optional parameters.

book_name.description: The name of the book from the Bible (e.g., 'Genesis', 'Job').

uppercase_mode.description: If True, the text will be returned in uppercase. Defaults to None.

text_mode.description: The mode of text to return. Defaults to 'vowels'.

chapter.description: The specific chapter number to fetch. Defaults to 1.
